name: 23-7DRL
description:
This is a failed 7DRL.  There's an overworld, a full dungeon, an inventory system, a character system, and a quest system, but there's no way to use most of it.

Oh, and the web build broke some of the collisions... so good luck.

Hey, game dev is hard, making a roguelike in 7 days is really hard.  I hope seeing what I was able to do in 7 days helps inspire someone else to try this inexplicably painful, yet some what fulfilling endeavor.  I love attempting this every year and I hope that every year there are new and inspired people that will inspire me to do this next year!   I hate these 7 days, I love these 7 days!  See you next year!!!
